data_source_validation.notes: SERP, PAA, and Search Intent data from live DataForSEO API. Content parsing skipped to optimize token usage.

search_intent.content_strategy: Commercial intent with informational packaging - User looking to understand costs (commercial decision-making). Must include: purchase prices by type/breed, acquisition costs, and support with cost comparison tables.

featured_snippet.title: Wie viel kostet ein Pferd im Monat?
featured_snippet.content_focus: Cost ranges by horse type (Freizeitpferd vs Turnierpferd)

must_have_topics.topic: Kaufpreis nach Pferdetyp (Freizeitpferd vs Turnierpferd vs Sportpferd)
must_have_topics.evidence: All Top 10 mention price ranges by horse type/discipline in title or snippet
All Top 10 discuss factors affecting price (age, training, breed)
8 of 10 mention specific breeds or breed categories with prices
Half of Top 10 mention equipment/additional purchase costs beyond horse price
All Top 10 include maintenance cost breakdown
5 of 10 mention insurance costs or requirements
Only 4 mention lifetime costs (50K-100K EUR range)

differentiation_opportunities.unique_angle: Comprehensive financing guide for horse purchase - only briefly mentioned in PAA but not integrated into Top 10 content
Detailed breakdown of pre-purchase costs (vet exam fees, paperwork, registration)

differentiation_opportunities.topic: Kostenvergleich: Eigenes Pferd vs. Stallbeteiligung vs. Gastpferd
differentiation_opportunities.unique_angle: Cost-benefit analysis comparing ownership models - only ehorses touches this
Geographic price variations - PAA asks about 'in Deutschland' but no geographic breakdown
Market timing strategy for buyers - completely missing

completely_missing.source: PAA question but not addressed in Top 10
completely_missing.reason: High-intent PAA question (from Level 2 expansion) with zero competition in Top 10

completely_missing.topic: Kostenübersicht für Fohlen vs. fertig ausgebildete Pferde
completely_missing.source: Age-related pricing mentioned but not comprehensively covered
completely_missing.reason: Fohlen are significantly cheaper - deserves dedicated comparison table

unique_angles: Clear price brackets for different horse types
Visual table format in featured snippet
rank_1_analysis.key_differentiator: Combines cost overview with insurance product angle

competitor_landscape.assessment: High-authority insurance and ecommerce domains dominate. Medium opportunity for quality content differentiation through comprehensive financing and hidden cost coverage.
competitor_landscape.ranking_difficulty: Established market with dominant players (ehorses, ARAG, wehorse). New entrant needs strong financial expertise + original data.
competitor_landscape.content_strategy_implication: Position as authoritative cost calculator/guide rather than competing with insurance products. Differentiate through:1) Complete financing guide 2) Hidden costs breakdown 3) Regional price variations

questions.question: Wie viel kostet ein echtes Pferd?
questions.reasoning: Direct answer to primary keyword - must be prominent

questions.question: Was kostet ein Pferd im Unterhalt pro Monat?
questions.reasoning: High-volume question related to acquisition decision

questions.question: Wie viel kostet das billigste Pferd?
questions.reasoning: Budget-conscious buyer segment - entry price point

questions.question: Was kostet ein 10 Jahre altes Pferd?
questions.section_placement: Preisfaktoren: Was beeinflusst den Kaufpreis? (Age subsection)
questions.reasoning: Specific age-related pricing question - supports preisfaktoren section

eeat_signals.credentials_reasoning: Market is dominated by insurance companies (ARAG, Uelzener) and ecommerce platforms (ehorses). Content needs either veterinary/equestrian expertise OR comprehensive financial data.
data_sources: Insurance company cost surveys (ARAG, Uelzener, etc.)

content_structure_analysis.implication: Most content separates purchase from maintenance. Opportunity to create unified acquisition+first-year cost guide.

keyword_opportunities_from_related_searc: Wie viel kostet ein Pferd monatlich
Wie viel kostet ein Pferd in Deutschland
Wie viel kostet ein Pferd mit allem drum und dran
Wie viel kostet der Tierarzt für ein Pferd im Monat
quality_assessment: GOOD - Excellent SERP data (10 results + 1 featured snippet + 4 PAA). High-authority competitive landscape identified. Clear content gaps defined. Commercial intent confirmed. Minor limitation: No content parsing (token optimization), but meta-data analysis sufficient for outline development.
